keyMoments.title: Akainu Executes Deserting Marine
keyMoments.description: Admiral Akainu demonstrates the extreme enforcement of Absolute Justice by executing a Marine soldier who attempted to desert the battlefield.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the brutal internal discipline of the Marines under Absolute Justice and the terror it creates among the ranks.

keyMoments.title: Sengoku Moves Up Ace's Execution
keyMoments.description: Fleet Admiral Sengoku announces that Ace's execution time has been changed and moved up as part of the Marines' strategy.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Marines' willingness to deviate from announced plans to gain strategic advantage.

description: The World Government's military sea force tasked with maintaining law and order throughout the world.

keyMoments.title: Allied Captains Lead Charge
keyMoments.description: Pirate captains Hangan, Reforte, and Arthur order their allied forces to charge into Marineford Bay to save Ace.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the coordinated efforts of Whitebeard's allies in the rescue mission.

keyMoments.title: Little Oars Jr. Falls
keyMoments.description: One of the allied forces' most powerful members, Little Oars Jr., is defeated by the combined might of the Warlords.
keyMoments.significance: Major loss for the allied forces, demonstrating the overwhelming power of the Marine-Warlord alliance.

description: The 43 allied pirate crews that joined forces with the Whitebeard Pirates to rescue Portgas D. Ace from execution.
leader: Various Allied Captains under Whitebeard's banner
